author: Oliver Dawnay
title: Bournemouth confirm they have reversed decision to furlough staff after ‘listening to supporters’ - talkSPORT.com
description: Bournemouth confirm they have reversed decision to furlough staff after ‘listening to supporters’ talkSPORT.com
content:
Bournemouth have become the latest Premier League club to reverse their decision to furlough members of their non-playing staff.
Liverpool and Tottenham have also reversed initial moves to make use of the government’s job retention scheme, which sees non-wor… [+2128 chars]
